name: DailyInteraction
description: This component limits how frequently a player can execute a flow, introducing realtime limits to the game.

gameFunctions.name: dailyInteraction
gameFunctions.description: Will cause a flow to fail if the user hasn't waited long enough since the last time they executed it.

configFunctions.name: updateTimeRange
configFunctions.description: Change how long a player must wait between interactions.

readFunctions.name: getTimeRange
readFunctions.description: Get the current time range for a player.
